entry.title: RT Will Wendt: Thanks @developer_dao for hosting a great Twitter space. It was great to share some of the unique things we are doing @OasisProtocol to...
entry.summary: RT Will Wendt Thanks @developer_dao for hosting a great Twitter space. It was great to share some of the unique things we are doing @OasisProtocol to push the web3 space forward and here some of your ideas about how privacy can be used in web 3 Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Tune in tomorrow to get started building it confidential 👀 @developer_dao 🤝 @OasisProtocol 🐦: 8AM PT / 11AM ET https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1yoKMZNeAyWGQ

entry.title: Finally the news is out 💫 Keep pushing notifications!
entry.summary: Finally the news is out 💫 Keep pushing notifications! Push Protocol | Previously EPNS: Dear EPNS community, friends, & builders 🔔 Today we have an exciting announcement. EPNS is rebranding to Push Protocol! The announcement is the first step towards a multi-chain communication future — allowing Push Protocol to be the communication platform of web3. (1/10)

entry.title: RT Accelchain: Re For example: @developer_dao is a DAO whose affiliation is mainly taken by developers in the web3 space. How to get into the DAO? Get...
entry.summary: RT Accelchain Re For example: @developer_dao is a DAO whose affiliation is mainly taken by developers in the web3 space. How to get into the DAO? Get the governance token of the DAO. In this case the governance token of Developer Dao is $code. Voila, you can now take part in their projects.

entry.title: Re Biconomy is a multichain relayer protocol founded by @AraBalaghi @@aniket_jindal08 @schin_tomar. Their mission is to improve the user onboarding an...
entry.summary: Re Biconomy is a multichain relayer protocol founded by @AraBalaghi @@aniket_jindal08 @schin_tomar. Their mission is to improve the user onboarding and transaction experience on dapps by making them as intuitive and easy to use as web2 products.

entry.title: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens | nader.arweave.dev: Wanted to learn how to implement gasless transactions, only found broken docs & a 50 minute tu...
entry.summary: RT nader (🧱, 🚀) | nader.lens | nader.arweave.dev Wanted to learn how to implement gasless transactions, only found broken docs & a 50 minute tutorial Decided to put together a basic example using a @biconomy relayer + ERC2771Context Meta Transactions Ended up being pretty simple, open sourced it here: https://github.com/dabit3/gasless-transactions-example
